snippet.title: Infini - Trailer 2019 | Steam, Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
NINTENDO SWITCH  - JULY 3, 2020: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/infini-switch/
Infini on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120420/Infini/
Infini on Itch.io: https://barnaque.itch.io/infini
~~~
Infini is a psychedelic puzzle adventure in which you play as Hope falling endlessly in a mind-bending wraparound space. 

Infini takes place in a world where concepts are personified. Hope is trapped in Infinity and is trying to escape. During his quest, Hope will interact with several other concepts such as Time, Poetry, War, Memory and Technology.

Website: https://barnaque.com/infinithegame/
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/barnaquejeux

Infini is published by Nakana.io: https://www.nakana.io/
